item.name: Home
item.description: So, it’s not every day that you find out that the Jacque Pepin Foundation is following you on Instagram and liking your posts. I immediately went onto their Instagram and dropped into a deep rabbit hole of French recipes. The first one I saw was Monsieur Pepin’s beautiful Berry Galette, and although French desserts are […]
